title: Can the effect of Twilight Ninja Getsuga, the Shogun be activated if you have no available Monster Zones?
question: Can the effect of Twilight Ninja Getsuga, the Shogun be activated if you have no available Monster Zones?
llm_answer: Yes, the effect of Twilight Ninja Getsuga, the Shogun can be activated even if you have no available Monster Zones. However, the Special Summon will not occur if there are no available Monster Zones to summon the targeted monsters into. The card will still change to Defense Position.
